interfaces.name: eth1
interfaces.description: WAN-facing interface for host-based IDS (attacks from macOS)

interfaces.name: eth3
interfaces.description: LAN-facing interface for gateway mode (traffic from client VM)

deployment_modes: single: Host-based IDS on single interface
dual: Dual-NIC with host-based + gateway modes simultaneously
interface_modes: host_based: Capture traffic destined to this host (ifindex=3, eth1)
gateway: Capture transit traffic passing through (ifindex=5, eth3)

validation.host_based: Look for events with ifindex=3 in logs
validation.gateway: Look for events with ifindex=5 in logs (DAY 10 objective)
